title: Il Santo Rosario
description:
La parola Rosario significa "Corona di Rose".

La Madonna ha rivelato che ogni volta che si dice un'Ave Maria è come se si donasse a Lei una bella rosa e che con ogni Rosario completo Le si dona una corona di rose.

Il Santo Rosario è considerato una preghiera completa, perché riporta in sintesi tutta la storia della nostra salvezza.

Con il Rosario infatti meditiamo i "misteri" della gioia, della luce, del dolore e della gloria di Gesù e Maria. È una preghiera semplice, umile così come Maria.

In tutte le apparizioni la Mamma celeste ci ha invitato a recitare il Santo Rosario come arma potente contro il Male, per avere la vera pace.

Il Rosario si compone di: 5 Misteri Gioiosi, 5 Misteri della Luce, 5 Misteri Dolorosi, 5 Misteri Gloriosi

Misteri della Gioia: (Lunedì e Sabato)

1. L'annunciazione della nascita di Gesù a Maria SS.

2. Maria SS. visita S.Elisabetta

3. Gesù Cristo nasce povero a Betlemme

4. Gesù viene presentato al tempio

5. Gesù viene ritrovato al tempio

Misteri della Luce: (Giovedì)

1. Il Battesimo di Gesù al Giordano

2. La Rivelazione di Gesù alle nozze di Cana

3. L'Annuncio del Regno di Dio con l'invito alla conversione

4. La Trasfigurazione di Nostro Signore Gesù Cristo

5. L'istituzione dell'Eucaristia, espressione Sacramentale del tempo Pasquale.

Misteri del Dolore: (Martedì e venerdì)

1. Gesù agonizza nel giardino degli ulivi

2. Gesù viene flagellato alla colonna

3. Gesù viene incoronato di spine

4. Gesù viene caricato della croce

5. Gesù muore in croce

Misteri della Gloria: (Mercoledì e Domenica)

1. Gesù risorge

2. Gesù sale al cielo

3. Lo Spirito Santo discende su Maria e i primi cristiani

4. Maria SS. è assunta in cielo

5. Maria SS. è incoronata Regina dell'universo

ISR (mail: ilsantorosario@icloud.com)

title: The Way Talk
description: "Ensinar a bíblia a sorrir". Talvez a frase chave que Emanuel Ferreira, orador não qualificado, certificado ou consagrado eclesiástico pelas hostes terrenas, melhor descreve os ensinos cristãos e conhecimento da Palavra de Deus que serão partilhados neste podcast. Ao mesmo tempo, há que salientar o facto desta descrição ter sido precisamente elaborada na terceira pessoa pelo próprio Emanuel. O que por si só já deixa a credibilidade futura deste podcast em atalaia. "Pois quem teve a ideia de colocar este gajo a falar das coisas de Deus? Então mas isto agora é assim?" Por acaso até não. Mas isso também explicarei aqui.

title: Unscripted Faith
description:
Unscripted Faith is a Christian podcast for women, girls, wives, and mothers. We explore Biblical insights and offer Godly advice and instruction as we grapple with these confusing times we've found ourselves in. 
Our goal is to point listeners toward Jesus Christ, the Bible and help us grow in the knowledge and grace of God so we can become more effective teachers, disciples, and role models for the next generation. 
In this podcast, you will find clear, frank, candid, passionate, loving and sometimes humorous discussions on a variety of applicable topics that face women today. We cover a wide variety of topics from parenting teenagers, dating/courting/marriage, to homeschooling and theology to church matters, setting boundaries, worship, growing spiritually, mentoring and dealing with those ever elusive emotions that tend to muddy the waters for us as we live day by day in this crazy world.

title: Antioch Tulsa
description: A team of people planted Antioch Tulsa in the Summer of 2022. Challenging to build the culture less with the what Jesus did, and more with how Jesus related. Building a culture where Jesus is the cornerstone has been a challenge but these 6 relational values found in Jesus have helped us in building out Antioch Tulsa. Thanks for joining us! Hopeful Expectation Simple Honor Courageously Together Wholehearted Authenticity Submitted Communication Humble Responsibility

title: Let It Matter Podcast
description: The Let It Matter Podcast seeks to make space for, honor, and name… what matters — to us as individuals, as communities, and as beloved children of God. Host Kelly Wolfe, alongside a guest each week, explores & discusses topics ranging from faith & theology to mental health & trauma recovery to sex & sexuality to social justice issues —all from a progressive Christian viewpoint. New episodes drop every Monday!

title: The Salty Mums Podcast
description:
Two mums, both podcast listeners, both at the same church. But we
both felt there was something missing.

Whilst we loved our faith or parenting podcasts, few podcasts seemed to
bring the two together. And when they did, they were more about the
mechanics of parenting- sibling rivalry, getting your kids to read the Bible
etc. But what about dealing with all the cultural and social stuff we
encounter as Mum’s every day? Divorce, grief, diversity, money, mental
health, disability, going back to work, friendships, illness – the list is
endless but they affect our lives as mothers and our walk with Jesus.
When secular culture is talking about all these things and we can’t hear
God in the discussion it can seem confusing and isolating.

We felt called to add Jesus to the equation of life as a mum by sharing
women’s stories and experiences of how Jesus has impacted their
walk with him. Jesus tells us we’re “the salt of the earth” (Matt 5.13) and
we need to keep salty- that means in our whole lives and that means
we need to talk about where Jesus is in motherhood too.

title: The Evergreen Podcast
description:
Meditations on Good Things.

Our Aim:
The Evergreen Podcast aspires to help young people behold and encounter the image of Christ. The podcast is ground on the principles of marrying both theology (faith seeking understanding) and spirituality (the faith-experience of what we understand intellectually). As an outward facing platform, Evergreen is designed to inspire curiosity in those exploring the faith and maturity in those already journeying with Christ. The hosts seek to lift the veil on the realities of being a Christian Gen Zer navigating the rollercoaster of life, to make listeners feel known, seen and loved.

title: Christ Fellowship Church Memphis
description: We are a fellowship of kingdom-minded believers ministering the life-changing gospel of Christ to a fallen world. We seek to show the world Jesus as we minister to the total man (spirit, soul, and body) and make disciples who live a lifestyle of worship unto God, honor the Lordship of Christ, and submit to His life-changing Word.

title: The Exchange
description:
The Exchange with Dr. Lorraine. This podcast will be discussing topics about Apostolic life & ministry that are dear to me by providing education and encouragement to the body of Christ. Some of the topics you will see on this podcast will range from disability ministries, mental health, women in ministry, apostolic education, prayer, & much more. Follow The Exchange on Instagram @theexchangewithdrlorraine Or follow our Facebook page: The Exchange with Dr. Lorraine

You can also subscribe to our YouTube channel at: https://youtube.com/@theexchangewithdrlorraine

title: Fostering our Faith
description: Ever considered adoption? How about foster care? Maybe you were thrust into kinship care with no notice. Everyone's journey is so different, yet we all have the same heart, serving the children in our world. Having spent my entire teen years in care, and having over 20 foster children, 4 adoptions, including 2 with special needs, I understand "the system" just a bit more than most. Hello, my name is Angela Paganelli and I invite you to join us as we listen to people who are connected to the world of adoption and fostering, all while building our faith, encouraging our listeners, and hearing that we are not alone. Thank you for listening!

title: Uncluttered: Shaping Your Heart & Home for What Matters Most
description: On the Uncluttered podcast, we discuss the connection between faith and organizing. Our focus is not just how to be organized but why it’s important, from a Biblical standpoint, that we leave the chaos and clutter in our lives behind.

2 THES. 2:10

title: FITT 4 The Kingdom: Renew You | The Evolution of HER
description:
Welcome to the "Renew You: The Evolution of HER" podcast! I'm Rachael, your host, and I'm here to guide high-performing Christian women (moms, entrepreneurs, and business professionals) in midlife toward optimal health and a balanced life.

Join me as we explore stress-reducing and hormone-balancing strategies, metabolic health, fat loss, root cause conditions, and the four pillars of wellness: nutrition, movement, stress management, and sleep. We'll also delve into the power of the FITT 4, the Kingdom philosophy and principles, which integrates faith, food, and fitness to nourish our mind, body, and spirit.

With my expertise in women's fat loss, metabolism, and hormone health, I am dedicated to helping you reclaim your health, body, and life. Through inspiring discussions, we'll uncover how these elements intersect and contribute to our overall well-being.

Tune in every Monday to embark on your transformation journey. Let's dive in and Renew You! 🦋

⁣✅ Sign up: FITT 4 The Kingdom Daily Devotional App! 📱✨ https://app.wordforyou.com/churches/access-code/FITT/register

⁣✅ Rachael Hultz⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣ https://www.facebook.com/rachael.hultz.renewyou/ ⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

⁣Disclaimer:⁣

⁣The information provided in this podcast is intended for general informational and educational purposes only. Any reliance on the information provided in this podcast is at your own risk. If you have or suspect you may have a medical or mental health condition, please seek the advice of a qualified healthcare professional. The hosts and guests of this podcast do not assume any liability or responsibility for any actions taken based on the information provided in this podcast.

Hey and welcome to the Braveheart Talks podcast, where we will be discussing some meaningful and insightful topics in the life of everyday women.

One of the greatest lies we allow ourselves to believe is;
”it’s only me“ 
“no one else thinks like this“ 
”no one else struggles with this“ 
BUT the truth is, no matter what age, stage or life placement you find yourself in, women are women and we are complex creatures navigating life through a torrent of emotions, hormones, relationships and mixed feelings.
Join me Emma Bryant and some of my friends as we have some open conversation that may help your life get a little better and you get better at life.

title: The River Worship - Sermons
description:
The River is a weekly, mid-week worship night. The purpose of The River is to provide an opportunity for people of all denominations, backgrounds, and age groups to have an all-out, powerful worship experience in the presence of the Holy Spirit and fellow believers. 

What should you expect on a Tuesday night? The second you step into our venue, you'll be greeted by our Experience team. They'll help you find a seat or help you find anyone you're meeting. We typically do 8 to 9 modern worship songs with a full production. We have a Spotify playlist too in case you want to familiarize yourself with some of the songs! We also spend about 30 minutes in the Word of God. 

The River is not meant to replace church. We believe you should get rooted in a strong Sunday community. If you don't have a home church, let us know! We'll get you connected. 

Join us any Tuesday night at 7:30pm. There's a seat for you. And of course, things will get loud!

Then you will be able to test and approve what God’s will is—his good, pleasing and perfect will.” Each thing we see, every pieces of news, every problem, challenge, injustice, opinion, or popular belief or thought should be analyzed through the lens of Christ and be taught on how to think about it.

It is my goal to encourage you using God’s Word and wisdom from influential people in my life. Romans 8:28 says "And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.", this podcast is for God's good and to grow His kingdom!

Welcome to Redefined Sisters. We exist to be a discipling community of women flourishing in faith and redefined by the beauty of the Gospel. We accomplish this by equipping women to be deeply rooted in the Word of God and to live in community with one another.
Mission: a redefined sister is maturing in her faith and fully engaged in the local church while discipling and investing in the spiritual growth of other women.
Our main goal is to equip women to implement discipleship groups in their local church and community with the tools and resources to become spiritually mature believers in Christ.

description: Building lives a weekly podcast with Joe Furey sharing what he has learned in Thirty five years of recovery, life, marriage, family, ministry and counseling.  We will be covering a range of topics facing people's everyday lives, breaking down truths insights and life changing principles which anyone can understand, and apply to the building of their lives and relationships.

title: BUILD THE KINGDOM PODCAST
description: Do you want to see the kingdom of Jesus advance through your life? Do you want to see real momentum in what you put your hands to for Him? Stephen Mcwhirter is unswervingly committed to WORSHIPING JESUS & LEADING OTHER TO HIM. His testimony of Jesus taking Him from addiction to redemption is a central part of his ministry. His song, “Come Jesus Come” has amassed over 24 million views across platforms. At the time of writing this, Stephen has seen over 33,000 people come to Jesus on TikTok and Facebook live, and thousands more traveling leading worship & sharing the gospel. This podcast is mix of sharing how God did it and the things He wants to do in us and through us to BUILD THE KINGDOM, not just a platform! Learn more at worshipjesus.life

title: Surviving The Fall Daily
description: I know what it is like to fall in the area of your integrity. I know what it is like to be exposed to the world for a lack of good character. I also know what it takes to bounce back. It's not easy but it is possible, and it is worth it. If you are trying get out of, bounce back from, or want to prevent falling in your integrity toon in.

title: Brothers in Christ: On and Off The Field
description: In this podcast, we talk about faith, sports and music. We will touch on different aspects of faith in our life, we'll highlight some Christian music we love, and lastly we will dive into and discuss all the latest sports news.

title: The Marked Life
description: Join us on The Marked Life podcast as we explore what it means to be a Christian actively engaged in the local church. Join our conversations as we share personal experiences and insights that will inspire and encourage you in your faith journey.

title: Intimate Inspirations
description:
Welcome to the Intimate Inspirations podcast. A Podcast inspired by my desire to help women see themselves as the princess God created them to be. I believe that all women have the desire to be beautiful, both inside and out. Unfortunately, we also have insecurities, whether big or small, that often keep us from finding our beautiful. Most often, these insecurities are simply the lies about ourselves that we believe, or have been told, rather than believing who and whose we are. In this podcast, I will be encouraging women, no matter what season of life they are walking through, that even though life is crazy, busy, and often tangled, they are not alone. I will be providing gentle reminders and ways to be a better "you", not only for yourself, but for those who you do everyday life with! I will also be diving into topics on intimacy in marriage and ways to spice things up a little!

I am Michele Blumentritt, and I am your host. I am looking forward to walking through life's journey with you and sharing my experiences that have brought me to this point. I am the youngest of three girls. I have been married for 24 years to man who loves the Lord and leads our family with strength and dedication. I have 3 beautiful children, a son and two beautiful daughters. My passion and excitement to share with other women how to find their beautiful are what inspired this podcast. Life is full of twists and turns, let's navigate through them together!

title: H3 Podcast
description: Believers Worship Center’s official podcast
author_name: Chris Ballard and Pastor Ivan Sheffield

title: It's Just Complicated
description: Welcome to the It's Just Complicated Podcast. I love to talk about anything and everything, how complicated life can be, and have fun, vulnerable conversations!  I hope to create a safe community to do life together as if you were right here! Come hang out with me every Wednesday!

title: RICH RELATIONSHIPS REFUGE
description: Rich Relationships Refuge podcast with Gilbert J and Renée M. Beavers is fantastic because it's the best place to really explore the reality of relationships — the good, the bad, and the painful and confusing. This podcast helps to illuminate what it means to be intimate with others and what it teaches people about them. It will make you want to strive for a kinder, more fun relationship with others. Many individuals don't have room in their hearts or life for people due to unforgiveness, regret, shame, and uncommunicated expectations. Rich Relationships is an experience with principles to learn. There are tools to use with an emphasis on building, repairing, and restoring relationships with individuals and families in a safe community environment that will stand in a world that's falling apart. Gil and Renée are originally from Detroit, Michigan. Their relationship started with Renée rolling the pencil off her desk and Gil picking it up. They never knew such a small act would create a 37-year legacy of love. Gil and Renée were only 21 when they happily committed to until death do us part. Gil retired from the Air Force, and Renée is a former salon owner who has been an entrepreneur and now an author for over 30 years. They have lived in over 13 cities throughout the United States and Germany. They are proud parents to an amazing and talented daughter, Aharon (pronounced like Sharon, except with an A). After a family tragedy, they also adopted Renée's little sisters (Carmen and Monique).This couple has helped many other couples establish a new habit of love to strengthen their marriage relationship through their tested relationship tools and principles and as marriage facilitators through the Prepare and Enrich Marriage program. Rich Relationship with Gil & Renèe podcast is back and ready to move forward and deeper into our relationship strengths and growth areas. Let's get empty of the pain from our past, unforgiveness, resentment, shame, and uncommunicated expectations.Our mission is to empower singles and couples to experience greater intimacy and fulfillment in their relationship with God, themselves, food, and money. This year our podcast will feature individuals and small business owners regarding their impact in these four areas. Gil and Renèe are looking forward to serving you and your relationships. Remember, you are more than enough! Now let's learn to live like it together!. YOU ARE MORE THAN ENOUGH! https://makingheadlinenews.com/2020/09/05/new-book-alert-alabama-couple-gil-and-renee-m-beavers-newly-produced-anthology-figures-to-have-a-massive-kingdom-impact/?fbclid=IwAR1dO2EfUCg3p1KZuCOu5dM5YsNYPJ84FKxA06o7W9HyVHUtaBJoJ1tsZRA https://youtu.be/Z8QoFNV1xg4

description:
Welcome to the FINAL COUNTDOWN! These podcasts are broadcast on WXRQ radio and streamed across all 50 states and 136 countries. Our Sunday morning live listeners have grown to 1.5 million from all corners of the globe.

Our longest-running series focuses on the Book of Revelation! Join us as this fascinating book of the Holy Bible declares what was, is, and is yet to come! We anticipate wrapping these lessons up around the end of November..

Our next series will focus on the Steps of our Lord!

We welcome your comments and feedback at ministry@christ-lives.org!

title: SafeSpacePodcast
description:
Everyone searches for a place where they can truly be themselves. Each of us desire transparency while protecting our vulnerability. Deep down, what we all want is a safe space. And if you’ve been searching, welcome home.

Safe Space Podcast, was created with this in mind. A place to pause and have candid, open conversations about the intersectionality of who we are without refrain.  Here in this space will we talk about the highs and lows of life, relationships, love, faith and more. We will laugh, cry, pray and so much more. Most importantly we will grow:  with each other and with ourselves. 

Join me, your host TaMar, as the room grows a little bigger, but the safety, openness and honesty remain the same.

It doesn't matter where you've been or what you've been through, God is the Promise-keeper. He's not interested in your perfection he wants your heart. Come explore your faith in the word. He's mended my brokenness and despair and he'll mend yours too. God doesn't just want some of you he wants all of you, I want that for you too, a Monday Morning Faith. title: Meeting Yourself Right Where You Are
description: Hey everyone! I am so excited that I finally started a podcast and I know most of you are too. I M.E.T Myselfinc stands for motivation, encouragement, and transformation. It is a non profit organization founded on February 1st, 2019. It is a safe space to motivate, encourage, and transform peoples’ lives by strengthening their faith through the word of God and bringing awareness to mental health. I M.E.T Myselfinc is based on the bible verse Philippians 4:7 which says “And the peace of God which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus. This organization significance to me is being able to leave a positive impact on those in and outside of my community. I want everyone to be inspired and always be reminded that they have a purpose in life and not to give up. On this podcast we are going to keep it real, no cut cards. The truth will be told and you just might not like what you hear, but it is definitely what you need to know! - Your host; Josie aka Miss IMetMyselfInc

John is a gifted preacher and apostolic leader who will inspire and equip you to pursue God’s purpose for your life. When we coach leaders effectively, we create multiplication and momentum. Psalm 139:14 is the foundation of the name FMQ which stands for Fearfully Made Queen. The goal is to educate my community at large, understand each other’s differences, and share testimonies to encourage those in similar seasons of their lives.

These talks will be R E A L. So prepare yourselves for amazing guests and topics. This will be a home for those striving to live righteously and wanting to know more about God, Life, Finances, Womanhood, Trials, Triumphs, Relationships and Faith.

title: The Holy Hustle
description: What's up! Welcome to our new podcast "The Holy Hustle"! In this podcast, Zach and Jaylin will be discussing what it means to be a follower of Christ and how we can balance our faith with the demands of everyday life. Our goal is to guide you towards opening your bibles and learning about discipling Jesus in our world today. We believe that being a Christian is more than just going to church on Sunday, it's about living out our beliefs in every aspect of our lives, including our work and relationships. Each week, we'll be sharing our personal experiences and insights, as well as having in-depth conversations with guests who have a passion for living out their faith in their own unique ways. Whether you're a seasoned believer or just starting on your faith journey, we believe you'll find something valuable in our conversations. So join us as we explore what it looks like to be a holy hustler, balancing our faith and our daily responsibilities. We can't wait to dive into this exciting new project with you! God bless!

title: Becoming Free Podcast
description: Kingdom Gifts Ministries is a faith building series for current and new believers of Christ. We are ministering to those who need more of God through testimonies, the word of God, and experiences. There are gifts that each one of us hold because of the Kingdom. In Roman 12:6 (NLT) says, " In his grace, God has given us different gifts for doing certain things well." There are God given talents that can be used for the Kingdom. For its all about the Kingdom, we all have gifts. This podcast will explore the gifts and many trials I have endure that God has brought us through.

title: Permission To Be Human

title: Holy Spirit - Do YOUR thing!! 🙌🙌
description:
Join us as we share stories of how GOD has done HIS thing and brought freedom, redemption, joy, restoration, abundance, and so much more. 
Ludwin and Margie Flores are the hosts of this show - however guests are also featured and will share their testimonies of how the Holy Spirit SHOWED UP!!! and HE DID HIS THING!!!! 
The Lord is GOOD! and this is our way of yelling it from the mountaintops: HE DID an INCREDIBLE THING in our lives and HE CAN DO IT IN YOURS TOO!! Hope you'll tune in :)

A través de sus pensamientos, el P. Alberto invita a la reflexión y al diálogo, siempre desde una perspectiva humana y comprometida con la verdad y la libertad. En cada episodio comparte sus ideas con una profundidad y una claridad que invitan a los oyentes a cuestionar su propia visión del mundo y a abrirse a nuevas formas de pensar.

El Dr. Harold Sala y Eduardo Palacio habla cuidadosamente sobre los asuntos que realmente importan, como las relaciones, la fe, el perdón, el propósito, la crisis o la esperanza y la desesperación, con los principios invariables transculturales de la Escritura.

title: The Catholic Dynamic Duo
description:
After having sought the truth his whole life, Vatman (Winston) fell for the many lies of the world falling into atheism and a life of sin. While having many scary experiences with the occult and demonic attacks, he finally realized that God was true, but his question was what religion's God was true? Having been baptized in the Catholic Church, but experiencing a traumatizing uncatholic childhood, he was left feeling like in no way was the Catholic Church the real Church of God. Having avoided the True Church and trying out many spiritual practices, God finally revealed His power and truth to Vatman (Winston). With the experience and research he could no longer doubt the Catholic Church.

After having been in love with the fantasy stories that came off the comic book pages and superhero movies, Cardinal (Sebastian) always wished that these stories were true or that superpowers were real. Funny enough he found out that they were true. After being caught by God in a time when he was finally willing to submit to him and attempt to give up sin, it was revealed to him how truly marvelous God is and how much He is a superhero and one that is real. After coming back to the Catholic church he met even more superheroes with the Saints. It was clear how much God's Saints are almost like sidekicks with real life superpowers being given from the real superhero himself Jesus.

Together The Catholic Dynamic Duo Podcast hope to provide a fun open space for all believers and non-believers hoping to be a great representation of Christ and not coming off as people trying to brainwash. Hopefully as a believer or not you can find enjoyment in our conversations of how much the true story of the Catholic faith influences fan favorite fictional storytelling, showing how marvelous and super heroic the Catholic faith truly is. Being the greatest Catholic detective duo, thanks to the Holy Spirit, we're able to see God's creativity in every nerdy work of fiction.

description:
Hello and welcome to “Who’s in the Pew!” I’m Melissa Pici, Editor of La Fe Magazine. This show is an extension of La Fe, and a production of We Hope, which is run by the Diocese of Laredo’s Communication Department.

Each week, we will get to know someone new, and learn a little bit about his or her unique involvement in our diocese. Join us here to meet “your neighbor,” the young adult seeking God’s guidance in his life, the woman who spends much of her free time volunteering to serve at her parish, the man who returned to his faith after years of rejecting God, the young woman who teaches teens about the merciful love of Christ, the widow who was carried by God when waking up to face another day seemed too difficult, and some of our clergy who have answered a special call to follow and serve our Lord.

We hope you will enjoy meeting others who “sit in the pews” of parishes right here in the Diocese of Laredo.

These messages are free of charge. With the teachings of faith always at your fingertips, your daily journey is sure to be strengthened through the word of God. Pastor Randall Crawford Sr. helps you to unlock the mysteries of the bible one sermon at a time.

About Bethel House of Truth:

Bethel House of Truth is an online ministry that focuses on spreading the gospel of Jesus Christ globally through our blossoming online presence. Our mission is to help people connect with the one true God and grow in their Christian faith. We provide a variety of resources, including Christian podcasts, faith-centered blogs, online sermons, and e-books to help people deepen their relationship with Jesus Christ. Our vision is to see lives transformed by the power of the gospel and to see God glorified through our online ministry.

Si eres un joven en busca de respuestas, o simplemente deseas profundizar en tu comprensión de las enseñanzas bíblicas, este podcast es para ti.

Así que únete a nosotros y profundicemos juntos en las lecciones de la Escuela Sabática, y descubramos cómo podemos aplicarlas en nuestra vida diaria para encontrar paz, propósito y dirección.

Amamos a Dios y amamos a las personas.

description:
Join Master Naturalist, Bible teacher and author Eryn Lynum as we explore God's Word and his created world!

What can a bird's migration teach us about God's guidance in our life? How can counting tree rings help us understand our life story? How can a milkweed plant help us cut off toxic thoughts and think about everything lovely and true?

God's wild wonderful world is full of amazing life lessons. As we get outside and adventure through creation, we'll discover how deep and wide the Father's love is for us!

Each episode of The Nat Theo Nature Lessons podcast teaches God's truth through visuals in nature. Nat = Natural, Theo = Theology. Where kids dive into the study of Natural Theology—discovering God through nature!

Being, not only blood brothers but brothers in Christ, they have all made a specific vow to each other that states, "I Will Be My Brother's Keeper."

title: Spirit Walking with Jesus
description:
Jesus Christ said that “God is a spirit, and those who worship Him must worship Him in spirit and in truth” as stated by Him in John 4:24.

Jesus also said, “...the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life” in John 6:63.

Therefore, it is the purpose of these podcast episodes to allow the words of Jesus Christ and others contained within the Bible to reveal what is meant in these and other ‘mysterious’ sayings in the Bible.

This teaching is especially aimed at those in the Christian community who need to appreciate that unless they become “spiritually minded” as commanded by the Apostle Paul, they will be deemed to be “carnally (or ‘religiously’) minded”—which will make them an enemy of both God and Christ:

“For to be CARNALLY MINDED is [eternal] DEATH; but to be SPIRITUALLY MINDED is LIFE and PEACE [with God]. 7 Because THE CARNAL MIND IS ENMITY [or an enemy] AGAINST GOD: for it is not subject to the law of God, neither indeed can be.” (Romans 8:6-7)

These podcasts will speak on spiritual topics such as:

  • What the New Birth represents (John 3:3-8)

  • God sees Christians as spiritual trees—either fruitful or fruitless (Mark 8:23-25; John 15:1-8)

  • The ‘Gifts of the Spirit (1 Cor 12:8-11) and how God requires every Christian to obtain and use them in their service as “...good and faithful servants” (Matthew 25:21)

  • The location and function of our soul, our spirit and the internal spiritual organs of our heart, mind and how evil spirits can influence their function.

  • ...and more besides!

My first podcast episode explains my spiritual journeyover the past 30-years and how God has allowed Satan’s people to afflict me in much the same way as God allowed Satan to afflict Job.

Join me in exploring what the words of Jesus Christ and (primarily) the words of His apostles say in the King James Bible so that we can each grow into a strong level of spiritual maturity so as to overcome the wicked one (1 John 2:13-14)!

title: Kingdompreneur Mentor Podcast

Have you ever questioned your faith in God? Is it strong enough? Am I consistent enough? Do I have what it takes to reap all my blessings?

Hello, KM family, and Welcome to the Kingdompreneur Mentor Podcast, where listeners experience God’s unfair advantage in life and business hosted by Reggie Flowers. Kingdompreneur Mentor supports the development of faith-based Intrapreneurs and entrepreneurs by helping them to dismantle their struggles and gracefully build a life of fulfillment and success while honoring God.

We exist to provide YOU with evidence that faith + skills x belief = disproportionate increase in your life and business. So whether you’re listening in your office, kitchen, car, or on the treadmill at the gym, thank you for trusting us with your ears as we continue to strive to maintain that trust.

title: የእግዚአብሔር መንግሥት
description:
‹‹እውነት ባዕድ(እንግዳ) ከሆነ ስፍራ ሊገኝ እንደሚችል ጓደኞቼ አስጠንቅቀው ነግረውኝ ነበር፡፡›› ዴቪድ ኒኮላስ

‹‹እስከ ዛሬ ብዙ የተማራችሁት፣ የሰማችሁትና ያነበባችሁት ያወቃችሁትም ሊኖር እንደሚችል እናውቃለን፡፡ ግን እስቲ እንደ ገና እነዚህን ገጾች ትሰሙን ዘንድ እንለምናችሁ፡፡ በገዛ ዘመኗ ጳውሎስ የሚናገረውን ለማዳመጥ ጌታ ልቧን እንደ ከፈተላት እንደ ሊዲያ ልባችሁን ይከፍተው ዘንድ እንጸልያለን፡፡ ሁሉን አዲስ ከሚያደርገው ጌታ ጋር እስቲ የእውቀቱን ቀንዲል እንደ ገና ለኩሱት፡፡ አዲስ ሰማይ (ልብ) እና አዲስ ምድር (ምልልስ) ይሆንልን ዘንድ በዚህ በዘመነ ሎዶቅያ ሌላ ዕድል ተሰጠን፡፡ ዘመንም ብቻ ሳይሆን የተሰጠን የዘመኑ መልእክተኞችም አሉን፡፡

አስቀድመን ከሰማነው ሌላ እንዳንሰማ ካመረርንበት ከተማችን መመለስና መውጣት አለብን፡፡ ስለ ወጋችን - ስለ ትምህርታችን - ስለ ‹‹አባቶች›› ቀኖና - ስለ አንድ ዘመን ብርሃን (እውነት) በግትርነት ጸንተን የእግዚአብሔርን ቃል ለመሻርና ለመዋጋት ያደረግነው የነፍስ ተጋድሎ ማብቃት አለበት፡፡ ለመንፈሳዊ ሃፍረታችን እራፊ ጨርቅ እንኳ ያሳጣንን የዛሬውን ‹‹መንፈሳዊነት›› ልንታገሠው የቻልነው በምን ልብ ነው? መንፈሳዊነት ማፈሪያ፣ እንቅስቃሴም የገዛ ምኞት ባሪያ፣ አገልግሎት ደግሞ ቅሌት… ዋጋቸው ባደረጉበት በዚህ ዘመን… በእነዚህ ገጾች ያሉትን ጽሑፎች ማንበብና መልእክቶችን ማዳመጥ ልዩነት ያመጣሉ ብለን እናምናለን፡፡ በእናንተ ልዩነት ባያመጣ እንኳ ዘመናችሁን ግን እንደሚኮንነው እርግጠኞች ነን፡፡

የምንላችሁም ብዙ ነገር አለንና ነፍሳችሁ እንጂ መንፈሳችሁ አይጥበብብን - የሚቤዥ ጌታ ያድርገው - አሜን!!

title: Well of Truths
description:
Well of Truths, a podcast idea that came to life when four friends Sean Sholola, Sam Omokodhe, Junior Mbuyi, and Aaron Kabenglele were hanging out and having a discussion about how the world is struggling to hang on to the truths that God created us to have.

This discussion gave birth to a podcast concept that would focus on discussing hot-button issues in today's society such as race, gender identity, relationships, vocation , politics, and purpose.

This podcast's major objective is to be the voice of young adults in a society where traditional, cultural, and modern theories have caused a lot of confusion.

Many people have questions and want answers, but they don't know where to look or how to get them, so they get off track.

Well of truths will be a resource where people can find their way to the right path which is the word of God found in the Bible. As John 8:31-32 says: “If you abide in My word, you are My disciples indeed. And you shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.”(NKJV).

With the help of the word of God and guest speakers from around the world, we strive to bring you the truth. Get Connected and listen to our podcast on Spotify. You can contact us through Instagram, Facebook, Gmail, WhatsApp, and text messages.

You can send questions our way and we will send the truth your way.

welloftruths04@gmail.com

description: The universe’s mysteries won’t solve themselves. That’s what questions are for. Questions lead to conversations, and conversations lead to the discovery of God and one another. At Mid-Week in the City, we face these questions head-on. Each week, we gather around tables to eat together and to talk about fear, hope, pain, spirituality, suffering, joy, the future, and much more.

title: The Awakening at FMC Bryan
description: Welcome to FMC Bryan! This channel broadcasts the 9 AM Awakening modern worship service. We hope wherever you are listening from you would consider joining us in our mission to love, witness and serve. For more information, please visit www.fmcbryan.org.

description: Examining the issues of life through the lens of God's Word. This is not a place where you will hear a bunch of opinions, rather you will hear the truth because the Real Talk doesn't come from me, it comes directly from God's Word. I am a certified biblical counselor and have a passion for helping people who are struggling or hurting. If you ever need prayer or have a question don't hesitate to send me an email at: jordanrileytv@gmail.com My hope is that this channel will be a resource for you and others. We produce New Videos (and podcasts) each week, and hope that you will watch and be pointed to Jesus.

Our mission is to impact the world with the message of Jesus Christ every day and everywhere.

title: New Hope Kapolei Messages
description:
Welcome to the New Hope Kapolei Messages Podcast, where we bring you the powerful and inspiring weekend messages from Senior Pastor Glenn Yamaguchi and other leaders of New Hope Kapolei.

Each week, you'll hear teachings and insights that will challenge and encourage you in your faith journey. From practical applications of biblical principles to personal stories of triumph and transformation, our messages are designed to help you grow in your relationship with God and others.

Whether you're a long-time member of New Hope Kapolei or a first-time listener, you'll find something here to inspire and equip you for your daily life. So join us each week and be refreshed by the life-changing message of the Gospel.

For more info and to stay connected, visit us at newhopekapolei.org.

title: Generasjoner

title: NHCC Apple Valley -  Audio Podcast

New Hope Community Church is a bible believing church in the High Desert of Southern California, where we "Love God", "Love Others", and "Serve Our World". Come join us learning and growing in our Lord Jesus Christ.

title: Building Microchurch Networks: Multiplying Without a Lot of Money
description:
Thanks for joining me as we explore future options that look better by the day. Microchurch has become the primary tool for moving forward in Europe as it is in many parts of the world.

As the U.S. follows Europe into a post-evangelical era, we need to be alert to what Europeans and Asians have learned about the effectiveness of the church whenever it resembles the church in its most fruitful era--that of the New Testament.

While I strongly advise you to download and read my short ebook, Mega.Multi.Multiply (free at Exponential.org), we will NOT follow or parallel that book in this series.

The MMM book is "descriptive," refraining from offering any "how-to" solutions or tools. We will be intentionally "prescriptive," presenting real-life stories, advice and even templates. The MMM book will make our time together more productive.

title: Convertidos POD
description:
Bem-vindo ao nosso podcast CONVERTIDOS POD, onde todas as segundas e sextas-feiras às 11 horas da manhã, compartilhamos uma palavra para ajudá-lo a se conectar com Deus.

Neste podcast, Raphael e Hermes, Hosts do Convertidos POD compartilham suas perspectivas sobre a Palavra de Deus e como aplicá-la em sua vida diária. Nós nos esforçamos para trazer uma mensagem edificante e encorajadora a cada episódio, com a esperança de que você possa se sentir mais conectado com Deus e sua fé fortalecida.

Se você está procurando inspiração e orientação espiritual, este podcast é para você. Acreditamos que a Palavra de Deus é uma fonte de sabedoria e conforto, e estamos dedicados a ajudá-lo a crescer em sua fé e encontrar significado em sua jornada cristã.

Então, junte-se a nós todas as segundas e sextas-feiras às 11 horas da manhã, e deixe-nos ser uma parte do seu dia, enquanto nos conectamos juntos com Deus.

title: Table Talk
description: Table Talk is a place for honest conversations and getting to meet friends. Join Betsy Thompson each week as she and her guest share how God is at work in their lives and/or ministry. Table Talk is a podcast produced by Sagemont Church in Houston, Texas. To learn more about Sagemont Church, visit our website at sagemontchurch.org or find us on social media.

title: STORIA PODCAST
description: STORIA is a podcast show for disruptive storytellers. Every week, producer-actor Fabiano Altamura and writer-director David Noroña interview creatives from around the world both inside and outside the Church. So whether you’re a poet or preacher, dancer or dreamer – or storyteller of any kind - you won’t want to miss our provocative conversations about what it means to be and become a kingdom storyteller. Because you were created by a creative God.

description: Welcome to the Yoked Men’s Life Group Podcast with Southern Hills Church in Las Vegas, NV where we explore God’s vision of manhood and masculinity as outlined in the Bible as well as its practical application to our lives today. What does the Bible say about “being a man” as followers of Christ, husbands, fathers, leaders, sons, friends? What does God want from men in the church, the workplace and our communities? Join us as we explore these topics and more.

title: Defeating Anxiety: Moving from Panic to Power
description:
A series of radio talks stemming from a debilitating anxiety episode.

Imagine your spouse fighting cancer while an investment manager lost 45 percent of your life savings and toss in a hotrod building project gone awry.

These events led to growing insomnia culminating in an emotional breakdown and eventual acknowledgment of a life of low-grade anxiety that exploded into an acute episode.

The teachings describe the coalition of the Word, the Spirit and modern medicine as an avenue to peace.

description: "Todo con Amor" is a podcast hosted by Bishop James Tamayo from the Diocese of Laredo, which originally airs monthly on KHOY 88.1. The show has now made its debut on various streaming platforms, aiming to reach a wider audience interested in matters of faith and the Catholic Church. In this podcast, Bishop Tamayo shares his thoughts and insights on a range of topics related to the Catholic faith, the Church, and the Diocese, always delivered with a spirit of love and compassion. Listeners can expect to hear special messages of guidance, inspiration, and comfort, as well as reflections on current events, trends, and issues facing the Church and its members today. Whether you are a devout Catholic or simply curious about the Church, "Todo con Amor" offers a welcoming space for reflection, discussion, and spiritual growth. Join Bishop Tamayo on this journey of faith and love, and discover a deeper connection with yourself, your community, and your beliefs.

title: Understanding Microchurch: Recapturing the Power of Close Community
description:
The normal expression of a Christian church is small.

In the United States, most congregations number fewer than 80 people. Across the world, the numbers are even smaller.

Big churches are the anomalies. However, large congregations that effectively operate as clusters of small ones are a growing phenomenon. We'll explore how this model is poised to plant new congregations outside the circle if their own fellowships.

Recapturing the power of "small" is key to fulfilling the Acts 1:8 imperative to take the gospel from our local communities to people nearby but somewhat unlike us and then to the far corners of the earth.

title: Inspirational Ash Daily Devotion
description:
Welcome to Inspirational Ash Daily Devotion, your go-to source for a quick and uplifting daily boost! In just five minutes or less, we infuse your day with inspiration, drawing from the timeless wisdom of scripture, relatable real-life scenarios, and heartfelt personal stories.

As your host, I'm committed to sharing my own experiences and insights, creating a space where we can navigate challenges together and emerge stronger than before. Don't let the hustle and bustle of life dim your inner light.

For more content like this, follow me on Social Media:

  • TikTok: @_inspirationalAsh
  • Instagram: @_inspirationalAsh
  • YouTube: @_inspirationalAsh
  • Facebook: Ashley Sanders

Subscribe now and become a cherished member of our community, united by the shared belief in the power of inspiration. Connect with me on social media to share your thoughts, stories, and experiences.

Join me on the enlightening journey of Inspirational Ash Daily Devotion, and let's embark on a path to making each day shine a little brighter.

Join us as we explore important topics relevant to youth today, including relationships, social media, mental health, and much more. Through interviews with special guests and discussions led by our youth leaders, we'll provide valuable insights and practical advice on how to navigate the challenges and opportunities of being a young person in today's world. Our goal is to create a space where youth can come together to learn, grow, and support one another in their journey of faith. So whether you're a regular attendee of Grace Covenant or simply interested in exploring your faith, we invite you to tune in and join the conversation. Let's grow together in God's grace!

title: Run For God: Run Club
description:
Do you struggle with getting motivated to run or study your Bible? Do you need a little extra Inspiration occasionally? What if you could hang out with someone who was always ready for a run and to talk about the parallels between faith and endurance? What if that person was full of enthusiasm and was dying to share it with you often? 

Look no further! Run for God is taking Run Club to the next level. Combining their Devotions style storytelling with today’s technology of Youtube, Podcasting, and Facebook Live, Run for God's very own Dean Thompson is ready to share knowledge, inspiration, and enthusiasm with you each week. For a low monthly subscription cost of $9.97 you get that and more. In addition, and more importantly, you help Run for God share the Gospel with the running world! What do you say? Could you use a positive kick in the pants, both spiritually and physically? What are you waiting for? Sign up today, and cancel at anytime!

Get registered at RunforGod.com/RunClub

From church in a strip club to a strip mall, going where Jesus would go to reach people Jesus would reach. The good, the bad and the ugly, all for the glory of God. A journey of misery & miracles. Your hosts are the founders, Pastor Keith and Kara. There really is hope for everyone.

We are so quick to judge on what's on the outside, when God looks at us from the inside out. So are you ready?

title: Me, First!
description: Me, First podcast attempts to show fellow Christians what it means to judge and examine themselves, before attempting to judge and examine others. For most, including myself, it is sometimes easier and more enjoyable to narrow in on other people and their flaws and sins, while conveniently ignoring our own. In this podcast, listeners will hear my heart, my troubles, personal struggles, prayers and rejoicing. All in all, I deal with "Me, First."

title: Harvest Time International Church
description:
Greetings,

As your Pastor, my heartfelt longing is to witness every member of our church walking in complete wholeness. Wholeness encompasses the well-being of your body, mind, emotions, and spirit. In III John 4, the apostle John shared his greatest joy in seeing his spiritual children walking in truth. The truth is that Jesus came to grant us total victory over every aspect and circumstance of life.

Once you experience this wholeness, the next step is to guide you into your ministry. We are all called to be ministers of Christ. God has planted a sense of purpose within each of us—an innate desire to serve. This inner calling serves as a gateway to discovering your true passion in life and aligns with God's guidance for your journey. Our Lord yearns for you to lead a fulfilled life, and He has a unique plan and destiny for each one of you. Regrettably, only a few ever uncover their destiny, let alone fulfill it. It is the church's responsibility to assist those who seek to live life to the fullest in discovering their God-given potential.

May abundant blessings be upon each one of you.

Yours in Christ,

Pastor Stacey Carver

TheHarvestChurchOnline.com

title: Intersecting Us
description: Brian Rihner and Dave Kester started their first business venture together in 1995. Now, 28 years later, they reunite again to talk about their passions of math, life, hope, and faith, and how they are all connected. They provided a probing and analytic perspective to consider the beauty, wonder and timeless treasures of these topics and how they have the power to draw us closer together.

title: The Living Unashamed Podcast with Ruth Turner
description: Hi, I'm Ruth and welcome to my podcast Living Unashamed! Join me as I chat with people from many locations and life stages, as they share their encounters with Jesus Christ and the journey He takes them on to discover the unashamed life of freedom and grace. We believe that there is power in sharing our stories and being open and vulnerable about the experiences we have. They not only bring hope and freedom to others but also draw us closer to the one who makes all things possible, God. Rev 12:11 "We overcome the enemy by the blood of the Lamb (Jesus) and the word of our testimony".

I am your host, jah! I'm so excited to share what the Lord has been brewing within me creatively. This podcast is an altar for the Kingdom of God, to bring unbelievers to the knowledge of Christ, and for believers to continue their pursuit of God in this creative space. Overall, I hope to encourage everyone to use their gifts to glorify God. As I share my journey in faith through this art, I pray you are inspired.

Please tune in every Wednesday at 11 a.m. Eastern time for a new cup of jahva.

I look forward to serving you!

Signing Off

title: Los 4 Fantásticos Jinetes del Apocalipsis
description:
Somos un equipo de cuatro amigos apasionados por el cristianismo y queremos compartir nuestras reflexiones, conocimientos y experiencias con todos ustedes.

En cada episodio, exploraremos una amplia gama de temas relacionados con la fe cristiana, incluyendo la Biblia, la vida espiritual, la moral, la iglesia y mucho más. Nuestro objetivo es fomentar un diálogo abierto y respetuoso, y proporcionar perspectivas enriquecedoras que inspiren y fortalezcan tu relación con Dios.

Ya sea que estés buscando respuestas a tus preguntas más profundas, desees profundizar en tu conocimiento bíblico o simplemente anheles un momento de reflexión espiritual, este es el lugar para ti. Nuestro enfoque amigable y accesible garantiza que tanto los creyentes como aquellos que estén explorando su fe se sientan bienvenidos y puedan beneficiarse de nuestras discusiones.

Únete a nosotros cada semana mientras compartimos nuestras propias experiencias personales, invitamos a expertos en teología y liderazgo, y exploramos las enseñanzas y lecciones que la fe cristiana ofrece para la vida cotidiana. Juntos, crearemos un espacio en el que podamos aprender, crecer y encontrar inspiración mientras caminamos juntos en nuestro viaje espiritual.

title: Be Still Pod

title: Did God Say That?
description:
Welcome to Did God Say That, a podcast where we strive to make God's Word clear AND relatable.

If you're like me, you've heard many, many, "and the Bible says quotes" only to discover that's not exactly what it says, or for that matter, what it means. After years of studying, I've found the Father will speak to you through His Word and tell you exactly what He means.

We will dispel myths, misquotes, mistruths, and misunderstandings of what Scripture says and what it means. We believe that there can be no proper application (how to live the Word) without correct observation (what the text says) and accurate interpretation (what the text means).

We will tackle portions of Scripture that are frequently misquoted and taken out of context. We will look at many untruths created based on denominational doctrines and beliefs that may not align with God's Word, and we will discuss how personal agendas can cloud how we interpret Scripture and apply it.

What You Can Expect:

1. You can expect Biblical truths.

2. You can expect to hear things you may have believed or been taught differently.

3. You can expect humor and laughter

If you're ready to understand the Bible better, what it says, what it means, and how to apply it to your life, I invite you to subscribe for free to the Did God Say That podcast.

title: Los Dos Lamanitas
description:
En este podcast mi hermano y yo hablaremos sobre diversos temas que los miembros de la Iglesia de Jesucristo de los Santos de los Ultimos Dias deberiamos abordar mas para poder aumentar en conocimiento y fortalecer el testimonio que tenemos de nuestras creencias.

Nuestro objetivo es ensenar principios del Evangelio de Jesucristo, exponer sucesos historicos, investigar sobre temas controversiales que surgen dentro y fuera de la iglesia, asi como entrevistar miembros y compartir sus experiencias de como esforzarse en vivir como Jesucristo ha bendecido sus vidas.

Este podcast no busca la discordia ni tampoco es contenido oficial de la iglesia, sino que nuestro objetivo es abrir dialogo! Si quieres aprender mas sobre como los santos de los ultimos dias viven, te invitamos a escuchar este podcast!

description: 365 My Life is a transformative personal development podcast designed specifically for individuals in their late 20s to early 30s. It is a comprehensive program that provides guidance, support, and resources to help you discover your path, transform your mindset, and soar in your 30s. With a blend of practical strategies, faith-based teachings, and a vibrant community, 365 My Life empowers you to overcome challenges, achieve your goals, and live a purpose-driven life. Join us on this empowering journey and unlock your full potential for personal growth and success.

title: Detours
description: Welcome to "Detours," a captivating podcast that explores the unexpected turns, detours, and redirections that occur in our lives and how they fit into God's grand plan. Join us as we embark on a journey of faith, resilience, and purpose, where we dive deep into the stories of individuals who have experienced profound detours and discovered divine meaning in their life's journey.

title: Holy Unhappiness with Amanda Held Opelt
description: Conversations about the expectations we have of what the life of faith will feel like. Each week Amanda Held Opelt (author of the book Holy Unhappiness: God, Goodness, and the Myth of the Blessed Life) will interview writers, pastors, artists, and friends about the myths we believe about "the good life." Together, we'll reimagine what blessing can look like when we are willing to look beyond our culture's definitions of happiness and success. Here we make space for grief, lament, weariness, and restlessness, trusting that even our unhappiness has something to teach us about ourselves, about God, and about the world around us.

title: Let's Share!
description:
The mission of Have A Need A Ministry (HANA), a 501 (c) 3 faith-based nonprofit, is to promote and support local community members sharing and receiving. The Let's Share podcasts model sharing of friendship, evidence of God's work in our lives, and the passions and organizations the guests have for sharing. The discussions of the sharing include perspectives among individuals and organizations, especially but not exclusively nonprofits with a Christian worldview. Guests on the podcast discuss their connection with the host and their passion to serve. HANA Ministry encourages free events and programs, information, items, and employment shared in communities on social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn. HANA's core values are based on scripture including Acts 4:32 - "All the believers were united in heart and mind. And they felt that what they owned was not their own, so they shared everything they had."

Podcast host and HANA President and Founder Dr. Leigh Byers has served in church ministry and faith-based nonprofit leadership positions since 2003 and is also currently an adjunct professor for a Christian university and a business consultant. Her passion is to support individuals and organizations to serve each other well.
author_name: Leigh Byers, Founder and President of Have A Need A Ministry

title: The Christian Patriot Hour
description: America. The "land of the free," the "home of the brave." We're all quite familiar with the words of Francis Scott Key's song, The Star Spangled Banner. But what is freedom anyway? What is the real meaning behind the word Liberty? Do we really know, or is it just a feel-good byword in our day; denoting freedom is something whatever one believes is appropriate for them. The truest meaning, the one America's Founding Fathers understood and conceived of for this great Republic, has now been relegated to the past I fear, lost in the shuffle of a progressive, perplexing, and troubled world which knows not the truth of our founding, neither the Almighty God who instituted the ideals of Liberty under God. Come along with me on an amazing journey as we navigate the waters of the past, looking into America's astonishing history, unrevised, unadulterated, and revealed without apology. We will find the truth together, and those who recall, they shall remember, and they who do not know, then shall they know. "If the foundations be destroyed, what can the righteous do?" (Psalms 11:3, KJV) I shall be drawing from Holy Scriptures, and from my book throughout. The book is Americans We Were. I am Henry Thomas Weber. Americans We Were: Weber, Henry Thomas

For over three decades, thousands of men, women, and vulnerable children affected by generational poverty have been empowered through a combination of skills training and God’s transforming love.

Join us on a captivating journey as we share inspiring stories of humble beginnings, the miraculous presence of God in our midst, invaluable lessons we've learned, and our unwavering commitment to Igniting World Changers worldwide.

New episodes of the ELI Podcast will drop every Tuesday, providing you with regular doses of inspiration and insight. Join us as we embark on a remarkable adventure together!

Discipleship through poetry and testimonies.

Leading a spirit-led life is often challenging. In a world dominated by social media and instant gratification, it is easy to lose focus on what is important: leading a life that brings glory to our God. However, God works for the good of those who love Him. This can be evidenced in our personal stories of faith. Listen in weekly as host Wayne de Roubaix shares personal testimonies of faith through poetry and devotionals. And hears from guests who share their stories of how God has worked in their life. description: Bread for Life podcast exists to give insight, guidance and share knowledge about life with people. The name "Bread" alludes to both the physical bread which colloquially references money, and we will provide guidance for people to make bread (money) to support themselves and their families ethically. The name also alludes to the word of God, a.k.a the Bible for us Christians, and how we are spiritually nurtured. Ultimately this podcast is meant to nurture those that listen to it and help them to find life, not only on this earth but eternally.

title: Athonite Testimony
description:
Now the God of hopefill you all with joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Spirit. (Romans 15, 13)

The love for our fellow-men, but mainly the love of Truth, the divine Truth revealed in the Person of the incarnate Word, Christ our God, has moved the hearts of the Athonite fathers to give in to the request of ever more faithful to create, be it in the digital space, a website where those wanting to find out about the views of the Athonite fathers on various current issues of spiritual life can do it easily.

The danger caused by the multitude of heresies of our days, as well as the growing confusion among Orthodox believers, generated by the negative impact of the secularization of today’s society, urged the Athonite fathers to take on the fight and confess the Truth.

Spirited by the divine love burning in their hearts and by the hope of victory in this fight, strengthened by the shadow of the Almighty, the strugglers of Orthodoxy lay down their souls for their brothers in Christ and preach the divine word “in season and out of season”.

May this their offering be accepted before God and bear rich harvest in the heavenly “barns”.

title: Living Spirit Led
description: We discuss the raw truth of our struggles, successes, and revelations of Christ together on this weekly Podcast/YouTube. We seek the Lord together on how to be more Christ-like and allow the Spirit to lead us into all things. Chelsie had a life-changing experience in a hotel with Jesus Christ and was transformed over night after the lord revealed to her the truth of Galatians 5:16 "for if you are led by the Spirit, you will not gratify the desires of the flesh." Our heart is to learn together how to be Spirit-Led and what all that entails in life on this side of heaven.

title: Welcome to the Gospel Impacts Podcast
description:
Welcome to "Gospel Impacts," an engaging and captivating chat show where we embark on a thrilling journey to explore the profound effect and impact of the Gospel on people's lives. Get ready to be enthralled as we bring you a diverse range of fascinating stories shared by captivating individuals from across the globe.

In this uplifting podcast, we invite remarkable guests to join us for delightful and insightful conversations. These extraordinary individuals, representing diverse backgrounds and cultures, open up about their personal experiences, sharing how the Gospel has transformed their lives. Each episode is a captivating exploration of the transformative power of the Gospel, encompassing joyous triumphs and unexpected blessings.

Join us as we navigate through intriguing narratives, infused with laughter, genuine connection, and heartfelt anecdotes. Our guests, with their unique perspectives and journeys, will captivate your imagination and leave you inspired. Together, we celebrate the beauty of diversity, showcasing how the Gospel transcends borders and touches hearts in profound ways.

Our global adventures take us from the streets of bustling cities to the serene corners of remote villages. Artists, activists, entrepreneurs, educators, and individuals from all walks of life come together to share their captivating stories. Through their tales, we uncover the remarkable impact of the Gospel on personal growth, relationships, and endeavors.

With a lighthearted and warm approach, we delve into the intricate tapestry of life, exploring themes of resilience, hope, love, and forgiveness. Engaging with our guests, we delve into the challenges they've faced, the lessons they've learned, and the remarkable transformations that have unfolded on their spiritual journeys.

Join us on this delightful chat show as we celebrate the incredible diversity of voices and experiences, shining a spotlight on the universal and transformative power of the Gospel. Through laughter, shared wisdom, and meaningful insights, "Gospel Impacts" invites you to be part of a global community united by faith and the extraordinary stories that emerge from it.

Tune in, subscribe, and prepare to be inspired as we embark on a heartwarming adventure, sharing the captivating tales of how the Gospel has profoundly impacted lives around the world. Welcome to Gospel Impacts

We, as men, are here on this earth to be leaders, husbands, fathers, sons, friends, brothers, uncles, nephews, and witnesses. R & B Talks is one place where we try to cut through the noise of the culture and the world and help give some real transparent views on important aspects of life, men, Christianity, or whatever comes up. Join us as we have real unscripted discussions about issues and life. Just 2 guys in 2 chairs talking.

title: Hope Ahead: A Journey of Infertility
description:
Hope Ahead is a husband's & wife's perspectives of being unable to conceive after a miscarriage. We hope this story/journey will glorify God & be encouraging to those who are currently dealing with or have dealt with infertility. We also hope that this will be informative to friends or family of those involved who don't know what to to say or do during this season. We pray for God to use this time in our lives to draw us & you closer to Him & to the ultimate purpose He has for us. We will pray during each podcast for God's will & blessing over this situation & give a scripture related to the topics discussed. This journey isn't easy, but knowing you aren't alone, and having an outlet to share and talk about it is a step towards healing. Often times, we suffer in silence and don't know how to talk about it. We also hope that this will bring more awareness to the issue and classification of "infertility" and provide more discussions and funding to work towards a better future for those of us in the "20%."

To watch our podcasts on video, find us @hopeaheadjourney on YouTube

description: The Bible consistently references life issues and problems and gives us the guide on how-to. However, have you realized the how-to normally requires communication, guidance and direction from God? Before a move is made or decision finalized, God wants us to consult with Him, invite Him, seeks His all knowing Wisdom. He wants us to use the Holy Spirit which is the part of the trinity that was left here on Earth to strengthen, encourage and assist us. God has had us on a journey that we can now say we see fruit from. Listen and walk with us as we embark on uncovering The Fruit of It all: a closer, more intimate relationship with God and a transformation only HE can take credit for. Welcome to the Fruit of It All Ministries. We pray that you’re bearing the fruit from all the stormy, treacherous weather that life has made you endure. We pray that you are showing character and heart changes that can only appear from a deeper connection with God.

title: Compassion Church
description:
Welcome to the Compassion Church Podcast, where we bring you our weekly sermons filled with love, grace, and forgiveness. At Compassion, we're all about Jesus. It doesn't matter where you come from, what you've been through, or what questions you have about God and faith. Our church is a place where imperfect people with diverse stories gather to experience the transformative power of Jesus' love.

In this podcast, you'll find sermons that speak to the heart, providing encouragement and inspiration for your spiritual journey. We believe in a community that doesn't focus on shame, guilt, or condemnation but instead embraces the unconditional love and acceptance that Jesus offers.

No matter your background or the way you dress, we invite you to join us as we explore the teachings of Jesus and discover the abundant life He has for us. Through our sermons, you'll encounter messages of hope, grace, and the practical application of God's Word in everyday life.

So, whether you're a long-time believer seeking deeper spiritual growth or someone curious about Jesus and looking for answers, the Compassion Church Podcast is here for you. Tune in each week to experience a message of love, grace, and forgiveness that transcends all barriers and brings us closer to the heart of God.

Join us on this incredible journey of faith as we strive to become more like Jesus and make a positive impact in our communities and beyond. Welcome to Compassion Church, where everyone is embraced with open arms and invited to encounter the life-changing power of Jesus Christ.

title: God and the Paranormal
description:
A BIBLICAL PERSPECTIVE on ghosts, UFOs, Bigfoot, cryptids, demons, angels, psychics, magic, miracles, and other paranormal high strangeness.

Why a Christian podcast about stranger things? Yes, there are many crucial topics for us to ponder and engage, such as evangelism, sanctification, outreach, and discipleship. However, there are often situations in which less important side issues sneak up from behind and bite the more important ones. Although the supernatural is just one component among many others in a biblical worldview, it's becoming increasingly evident that unbiblical paranormal beliefs are significantly altering the worldviews of our society and of many Bible-believing Christians. The pop-culture paranormal makes people question what they've believed to be true, which ultimately leads many to question the integrity of God's Word. Worldview matters, and when worldviews change, there will be tangible consequences to evangelism, discipleship, and faith in general. "God and the Paranormal" takes an in-depth look at what "experiencers" claim and how the phenomena interact with scriptural truth.

See YouTube versions for pic, notes, charts,,,

title: Trueness Of The Words with Elenor A. Fleming
description:
Trueness Of The Words Is a Place For Women Where We Are Authentic & Vulnerable!

ABOUT ELENOR:

For Women Authentic & Vulnerable we are! Trueness Of The Words was birthed in me over a decade ago. I could not understand it then why the name came to me so clearly or how I would ever be able to actually use it. What I was clear on, was that God had given me the name.

I have a strong desire within to give an Authentic and Vulnerable voice to the issues that come upon women, mother & daughter relationships, single women and married women by way of my own hurts and pains that I carry daily and some the daily has turned into years. Longsuffering is what the Word of God calls it. The voice I will give will come with truth, hurts, pains, vulnerability, beginnings, endings, unforgiveness that God has brought me through over to forgiveness and some that I’m still struggling with. Trusting the Lord through it all can be done, but the Authentic and Vulnerable voice understands even as a follower of Jesus Christ it’s not always easy as we are often told. Study: Gal 5:22; 6:7 and Cor 3:6-9

Subscribe to this podcast and Join me as we take this journey together, as two are better than one (Ecclesiastes 4:9-12). I will be Authentic and Vulnerable as I will share my experiences, along with guests that I’m taking time to ask God in prayer for His guidance alone, for who they are to be, so that we can help you achieve a peace and relation with our Father in heaven that cannot be moved by the things and obstacles on our earthly path.

title: Is God Mother?
description:
Co-hosts Amy Stapleton and Shealy Salas explore the World Mission Society Church of God from the Christian perspective.

Episode 1 "What is a cult?" In this episode we talk about the definition of a pseudo-Christian cult and what the major pseudo-Christian cults have in common. We also discuss how to respond if a member of a cult approaches you or if you have a friend or family member who you think might be in a cult.

Episode 2 "Who are these people?" In this episode we dive deeper into the World Mission Society Church of God and explore their history and what they believe.

Episode 3 "Is God Mother?" In this episode we look at the major claims the WMSCOG makes about the Bible including their belief that God is mother. We share some basic rules for how to interpret Scripture and we give a refutation for each major claim.

Episode 4 "The baby and the bathwater" In this episode we examine the historical evidence for Christianity - touching on the topics of the unity of the Biblical message, the truthfulness of the Bible and it's accuracy. We compare the historical evidence for Christianity with that of the WMSCOG and other cults.

title: God's News In The News
description:

title: Well for Goodness Sake - THE 4:8 LIFE
description:
Welcome to Well for Goodness Sake, a PODCAST about keeping it real through real live talks and throughout all walks of life. Whether or not you are a parent, a student, a young person, married or single, or maybe you’re just now recovering from a broken relationship, this is a SAFE SPACE for you to be able to come and relax, to listen, and to find encouragement as well as that desired and relatable connection with other people who might be in the same boat you’re in right now. I am here to laugh with you, to love on you, and encourage your heart with all of mine – as much as God gives me the words to do so. We are simply searching the heart of God by getting in His presence, diving into His word, and pursuing THE 4:8 LIFE. What is THE 4:8 LIFE? Well, that’s what we are here to talk about. It begins by applying my life verse - Philippians 4:8, and then by getting in God’s presence FIRST AND DAILY and applying practical truths found in scripture in order to find that perfect peace, identity, and purpose.

YOU ARE NOT ALONE! Life is full of chaos, and through all of the ups and downs we experience in life, relationships, and circumstances, often outside of our ability to alter or control, we need God’s mercy and grace. We need to laugh and cry, rest and then push forward, and find that peace by embracing God’s infinite purpose for each of us. We do this by focusing on what is true and on things worthy of our time, HIS LOVE for us! Do you know how much God loves you? Do you really know?

WELCOME to this SAFE SPACE. I am so glad you’re here with me.

title: Haggai 1 - Consider your Ways
description:
Consider your ways = to set your mind, heart, & soul on course with God.

Consider = Set

Your = is your inner man – heart, mind, & soul.

Ways = path and course

Here’s an overview of what Haggai longs for the people of God to Consider and what we can learn from Haggai today:

Reset Priorities -

Take a deep look inward to your own ways – What motivates you to do what you do? What is your highest priority or big 3 in life?

Realigned Purposes -

Glance outward to the world around us and the work, The world you is need desperate need of spiritual repair and renewal that only Christ can bring.

Renewed Worship -

Gaze at the Lord of Hosts: When we set our hearts, minds, souls on the Lord of Hosts Then allow the Word of the Lord to change them.

title: A Light On The Hill
description:
Welcome to "A Light on the Hill," the podcast that ignites your curiosity and illuminates the hidden stories that shape our world. I'm your host, Shan Hutch, and I'm thrilled to invite you on a journey of discovery that will leave you inspired, informed, and hungry for more.

In a world overflowing with noise and haste, it's easy to overlook the stories that truly matter—the stories that offer a deeper understanding of our past, present, and future. This podcast isn't just a collection of conversations; it's a beacon of knowledge, shining a light on the most captivating narratives that often go unnoticed. Join me as we embark on a mission to unearth the gems buried beneath the surface.

Why is "A Light on the Hill" an essential addition to your playlist? Because it's not just another podcast—it's a source of enlightenment, a place where stories are not only told but woven into the fabric of our collective consciousness. Each episode is carefully crafted to transport you to a different time, place, or perspective, allowing you to see the world through fresh eyes.

As your guide, I'm not here to simply relay facts; I'm here to create an experience. My passion for storytelling and my insatiable curiosity drive me to uncover the layers of each narrative, revealing the emotions, challenges, and triumphs that define them. Together, we'll explore the intersections of science, art, philosophy, and human nature, connecting the dots between seemingly disparate threads to reveal the rich tapestry of our existence.

But it's not just the content that sets "A Light on the Hill" apart—it's the sense of community we're building. This podcast isn't a one-way street; it's a conversation starter. Engage with us on social media, share your thoughts, and suggest topics you're eager to explore. Let's create a space where curiosity is celebrated and knowledge is a treasure shared among friends.

title: a touch of salt
description:
Everyone is searching for truth, and we all have opinions on what we believe.

We are a group of regular people, the kind you walk past in your grocery store or at work, who have found Jesus and are pursuing Him.

Join us on The New Faith, a podcast that seeks to understand how modern Christians are wrestling with faith and politics during this fraught time.

title: Welcome to Conversations at Midnight | A Podcast for Black Women
description:
Hey ya'll! I'm just a regular around-the-way girl who had an idea, a purpose, and saw a need for a podcast such as this to be created.

Conversations at Midnight is a podcast created and designed by a black woman for black women. Black women are becoming entrepreneurs, trailblazers, and trendsetters. On the road toward academia and career success, there are many barriers that black women face in efforts to get society’s standard of “making it.”

Conversations at Midnight is a place for vulnerable and honest conversations to take place between black women to share issues that we all may be going through (or struggling through) in private.

There will be guest appearances by real, normal, and relatable women with impactful testimonies that have the power to change, heal, and restore the older generations and the next.

Subscribe to Conversations at Midnight on YouTube, Spotify, and Google Podcasts. I promise it’s a conversation that you DON’T want to miss!
